title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 126.2 - When permit is necessary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 126.2 - When permit is necessary

State Regulations
(a) Any
permittee desiring to temporarily obstruct or to install, construct, maintain
or operate any facilities within the bounds of a State highway right-of-way, must secure a permit for such work from the Commissioner of

Transportation. (b) This work
includes excavating, filling, trimming trees, erecting poles, stringing wires, changing driveways, curbs or any modification of the highway drainage system or
shoulders, paving, or work of a like nature under, or over or along the
highway. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
126.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
